roleset.name: to shrink back, as in fear
roleset.note: CRINGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cringe' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from cringe.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: When he later sided with striking hospital workers [*T*-1] , some allies [*ICH*-2]cringed a little more , [concerned that Mr. Dinkins was setting the wrong tone for coming contract negotiations with city employees]-2 .
example.arg: When he later sided with striking hospital workers [*T*-1]
